definition: showing lack of attention or boredom, an involuntary intake of breath through a wide open mouth
details:
adjective
- showing lack of attention or boredom
= example: showing lack of attention or boredom
= synonyms: drowsy
- gaping open as if threatening to engulf someone or something
= example: gaping open as if threatening to engulf someone or something
- with the mouth wide open indicating boredom or sleepiness
= example: with the mouth wide open indicating boredom or sleepiness
noun
- an involuntary intake of breath through a wide open mouth
= example: an involuntary intake of breath through a wide open mouth
= synonyms: yawn
